​

​The table gives values for the invertible function <math alttext="y equals f open parentheses x close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> for selected values of <math alttext="x"><semantics><mi>x</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. Which of the following input-output pairs describes <math alttext="f to the power of negative 1 end exponent"><semantics><msup><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?
